thread.title: Fleur East reveals 'Sax' will be the first track released from her debut album - Music
thread.title_full: Fleur East reveals 'Sax' will be the first track released from her debut album - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Fleur East reveals 'Sax' will be the first track released from her debut album - Music
text: Fleur East has announced 'Sax' will be the first single from her debut album.East has co-written the track along with Electric, JHart and Camille Purcell and said it is old school but "with a modern twist". Â© Getty Images / Ian Gavan She said: "I always knew that 'Sax' would be the first single. It's fun, cheeky and a song that people can move to. "It's indicative of the sound that's on the album; a salute to the old school with a modern twist. I'm excited for people to hear it and hope they love it as much as I do."Last year's X Factor runner up has spent the last eight months writing and recording the record working with luminary producers such as Fraser T Smith, Rodney Jerkins, TMS and Oak.'Sax' will be released in the UK on October 23 with her debut album to follow in November.Meanwhile, Simon Cowell recently revealed that he is very excited about new releases from both East and X Factor winner Ben Haenow.Haenow will follow up his winning single 'Something I Need' with his next single 'Second Hand Heart', a duet with American Idol winner Kelly Clarkson. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4446806018001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14446806018001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4446806018001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4446806018001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14446806018001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4446806018001.init(); ai_type="video"; }
